title: Save more than $200 on Rosetta Stone for Cyber Monday
content:
Macworld

If you want to learn a new language next year, now’s the time to get your studying squared away. As part of our Cyber Monday deals, we’re offering one of the best discounts you’ll find on the award-winning language learning software, Rosetta Stone. Through December 3, you can get it for more than half off.

Rosetta Stone is one of the most highly accoladed language learning programs in the world, nicknamed the “Gold Standard” of language learning by CNN and called “the next best thing to living in a country” by The Wall Street Journal.

With this deal, you’ll have lifetime access to all languages in the Rosetta Stone learning library, as well as proprietary tools like the speech recognition program TruAccent and the world’s leading curriculum.

Ready to learn a new language? Now through December 3, you can get a lifetime subscription to Rosetta Stone for more than half off $399 at just $149.97.
